text.body:
itu pakaivar tiṟai tanta nāṭu kāttaṟkup pirikiṉṟamai yuṇarntu talaivi vēṟupaṭṭamai kaṇṭu tōḻi avaṉai etirppaṭṭu avaḷatu āṟṟāmaiyum iḷamaiyatarumaiyuṅ kūṟic celavaḻuṅkuvittamai talai-makaṭkuk kūṟiyatu.
paṭaipaṇṇip puṉaiyavum pāmāṇṭa palavaṇaip
puṭaipeyarn toṭuṅkavum puṟañcēra vuyirppavu
muṭaiyatai yevaṉkoleṉ ṟūṟaḷan tavarvayi
ṉaṭaicellāy naṉiyēṅki naṭuṅkaṟkā ṇaṟunutāl;
tolleḻi ṟolaipiva ṭuyaruḻappat tuṟantunī
valviṉai vayakkutal valittimaṉ valippaḷavai
nīḷkati ravirmati niṟaivupō ṉilaiyātu
nāḷiṉu nekiḻpoṭu nalaṉuṭa ṉilaiyumō;
āṟṟaṉō yaṭaviva ḷaṇivāṭa vakaṉṟunī
tōṟṟañcā ṟokuporuṇ muyaṟimaṉ muyalvaḷavai
nāṟṟañcā ṉaḷipoykai yaṭaimutir mukaiyiṟkuk
kūṟṟūḻpōṟ kuṟaipaṭūum vāḻnāḷu nilaiyumō;
vakaiyeḻil vaṉappeñca varaipōka valittunī
pakaiyaṟu payaviṉai muyaṟimaṉ muyalvaḷavait
takaivaṇṭu putituṇṇat tātaviḻ taṇpōtiṉ
mukaivāytta taṭampōlu miḷamaiyu nilaiyumō;
eṉavāṅku,
poruntiyāṉ ṟāṉvēṭṭa poruḷvayi ṉiṉaintacoṟ
ṟiruntiya yākkaiyuṇ maruttuva ṉūṭṭiya
maruntupōṉ maruntāki maṉaṉuvappap
perumpeyar mīḷi peyarntaṉaṉ celavē.
